xxl.core.util.random
Interface DiscreteRandomWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper
public interface DiscreteRandomWrapper

This class provides a interface for wrapping different kinds of PRNGs (pseudo random number generator) for using them within xxl. A default implementation is given by JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper using java build-in PRNG.
Caution: It is recommended not to use this PRNG cause of its lack of speed and quality.
Instead one can use the MersenneTwister PRNG provided by the java library colt (http://tilde-hoschek.home.cern.ch/~hoschek/colt/index.htm").. An implementation of this interface for using them with the colt library could be found in the connectivty.colt package.

See Also:
Random, JavaContinuousRandomWrapper, JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper, DiscreteRandomWrapper

Method Summary
 int nextInt()
          Returns the next randomly distributed integer value given by the wrapped PRNG.
